org.apache.lenya.cms.linking
Interface LinkRewriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
IncomingLinkRewriter, OutgoingLinkRewriter, ServletLinkRewriter, UrlToUuidRewriter
public interface LinkRewriter

Interface for services which convert links from one form to another.
